page.title: 09HOUSE SURVEY 1
page.content: We made a survey of the 91 houses in Walkhampton, with a list of questions. 1. How old were the houses? -About 2/3 were{modern,}ie. built since the Second World War, of which the majority were council houses, most of which had been bought. A private estate of 16 had been built in the last 5 years - expensive detached houses. - 11 houses were built within the last {100 years}- either detached or large semi-detached. 2 were renovated. - Another 14 were{over 100 years}- tended to be small and terraced 2.What were the extra{features?} -77 had telephones, twenty were double glazed. Thirty had garages. The oldest houses did not have gardens at the front. The older houses had walled gardens and the newest open plan gardens.
